## useSDK() function

Use this to access the ThirdwebSDK instance directly.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useSDK(): ThirdwebSDK | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

ThirdwebSDK \| undefined

an instance of the ThirdwebSDK or undefined if no chain is defined
